member.name: IDWriteTextFormat2.GetLineSpacing
member.summary: Gets the line spacing adjustment set for a multiline text paragraph.
member.param: A structure describing how the space between lines is managed for the paragraph.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat2.SetLineSpacing
member.param: How to manage space between lines.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat2
member.summary: Describes the font and paragraph properties used to format text, and it describes locale information.
